description: Monsha is one of three new pilots assigned to the Albion as it sets off in pursuit of the stolen Gundam GP02A. A veteran pilot who served under Burning in the One Year War, he takes an immediate dislike to the young upstart Kou. Meanwhile, Monsha makes a general nuisance of himself aboard the ship with his boozing, gambling, and incorrigible woman-chasing.
name: Bernard Monsha
